reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for 1500 Ram truck. Great value.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and perfect fit for our 1500 Ram truck. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Simone hit my mirror. So mirro fell of. Didn’t want to buy the entire side mirror w bracket. So tried this and works well. Have it on for about 4 months or so. Still on and doesn’t vibrate when you drive which happened before when I purchased a complete aftermarket side mirror before for another truck I used to own. Highly recommend this mirror if you just want to replace mirror. Comes w the clips which is what I wanted and one of the main reasons I purchased this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Reviewed YouTube video before replacing mirror. Easy to remove and install. Item doesn’t have all the connections as OEM. Main connection for mirror defrosting is intact. An additional connection on mirror not available. That said mirror seems to work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits as it should. Installed in a few minutes. Snapped right in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No instructions, but easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not compatible with 2016 RAM 1500 Bighorn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took me about 4 min to install on my passenger side. (tip.. change this out when the temp is hot. plastice will tend to break when the temp is cold.) The clips worked fine. I only used one clip and reused one off the old one. Just an FYI. This mirror only has the ability to heat or defrost, it does not have the tenting ability that some (like my 13 ram came with from the factory). Those will run you a lot more than the cost of this one. But if you need a quick replacement this one works well. I have drove about 500 miles since installing and haven't had any shaking or problems with it. Works like the org. Just doesnt have the self tenting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s an ok mirror not the best, light isn’t that reflective so at night you can’t really see what’s showing in the mirror

I purchased this for my brothers RAM it fits a little tight but does thr job. There is no auto dimming but it's for a passenger mirror and is slightly bigger then the OEM but much cheaper in price. It does work great.
Cane very fast! Easy to install works perfectly..great pricing...140 cheaper than the auto body shop
it's as it advertized and fits
